decision_conditions: Condition : 1 - The development hereby permitted shall be begun before the expiration of three years from the date of this permission.

Condition : 2 - The proposed development shall be carried out in all respects in accordance with the proposals contained in the application and the plans submitted (Location Plan, Design and Access Statement, S 001, S 002, S 003, S 004, S 005, S 006, S 007, P 202, P 203, P 204, P 208. Received 17/02/2017
P 201B, P 205B, P 206B, P 207B, P 209A. Received 18/04/2017) therewith and approved by the Local Planning Authority, or as shall have been otherwise agreed in writing by the Local Planning Authority before the building is used.
Condition : 3 - The materials to be used in the construction of the external surfaces of the extension hereby permitted shall match those used in the existing building.

Condition : 4 - No additional windows or other glazed openings shall be formed in the  side walls of the extension hereby approved and no additional doors inserted in the building without the prior written consent of the Local Planning Authority.

Condition : 5 - The two cycle parking areas as shown on the approved plans shall contain a single Sheffield Stand within each shelter. Each shelter shall be a roofed timber or proprietary cycle storage construction not more than 2m high with a minimum width of 1.5m and a minimum depth of 2m. These shall be installed prior to the completion of the development and permanently retained thereafter.

Condition : 6 - The areas of fencing as shown on the approved plans to each side of the building shall be of a two metre high close board timber construction. These shall be installed prior to the completion of the development and permanently retained thereafter.
description: Erection of part single / part two storey rear extensions, conversion of garage into habitable room and erection of side and rear roof extension and associated bin store and cycle parking area
